item.title: Useful Tips When Writing Codes on Vscode
item.author: Author
item.description: Zip a folder: zip -r destination_folder_name.zip source_folder_name Unzip a folder: unzip source_folder_name.zip -d ./destination_folder_name/. ./ means current directory, ../ means parent directory, ~ means home directory, / means root directory. Do not use / directory !!!

item.title: How to write posts
item.author: Author
item.description: hugo new posts/first-post.md on FujiaoBlog write in content/posts/first-post.md, change draft to false In FujiaoBlog, hugo -t LoveIt cd public/, git add *, git commit -m "XXX", git push
